Package controller

Class ModifyCustomerController

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class holds the logic for the Modify Customer form.
